basic.description: This course provides core knowledge about the structure and function of the human kidney and urinary system in health and disease across the lifespan. The course integrates knowledge from across the traditional disciplines in basic, behavioral and clinical sciences and applies that knowledge in understanding and treating patients.
basic.subject: BMS
basic.title: Medicine 3 Human Systems in Health and Disease: Renal-Urinary System

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite: Matriculation to FSU College of Medicine MD Program.
